name: Leo
effect: [On Play] You may rest your Leader or 1 of your Stage cards: If your Leader is [Usopp], look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 2 {Dressrosa} type cards other than [Leo] and add them to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order, and trash 1 card from your hand.
